duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform complex tax preparation, tax research, and tax planning with minimal supervision
Provide work direction and technical guidance to less experienced staff
Contact clients to resolve minor tax matters
Perform tax planning under direct supervision
Review tax work of less experienced staff
Review tax information supplied by client and make recommendations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting required with 3-5 years’ experience in accounting or related field. Eligible to sit for CPA certification. Master's degree preferred
